channel.title: Moving the Client development
channel.description:
This isn't a big request, and honestly isn't asking a lot.
But, I was thinking if we moved all the client development above the Server development, the client development, and model development would start getting more traffic and more development.
As there isn't too much development in either.
Pros/cons?
Discuss.

item.title: Moving the Client development
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

I’m up for it

Read full topic

item.title: Moving the Client development
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

Newty:

People are always going to be more inclined to continue server development because it is typically easier to develop a server (because of all the tutorials) then it is to develop a client.

But what if we tried it?

Read full topic

item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

krackkid:

I don’t really think this will help anything. I mean if people wanted to go to them section they would, face it there is little client development now a days people just get the default client that works and there done.

It wouldn’t hurt to try

item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“riku9182, post:3, topic:382885”][quote author=Liquid Magic link=topic=478671.msg3504112#msg3504112 date=1297999849]
Overdose and then indulge until you die.
Pondering, we all ask the question why.
Broken home, and then abandoned by your dad.
And we are left the only family that you’ve ever had.
[/quote]
Stop[/quote]
omg it’s herobrine!
